entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MyTracks: GPS Recorder
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime PremiumÔºö$9.99
  • 300 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$3.99
  • 100 Altitude Query TimesÔºö$2.99

Application Description

MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations. Here's what you can do with MyTracks: - Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map. - Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app. - Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ. - Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks. - Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations. - Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance. - Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time. - Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track. - Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification. Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

entry.title: IPTV Smart Pro - Live TV
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Get the New Generation Professional IPTV Smart Player application. Download the new generation professional and AI technology IPTV player now and enjoy unlimited entertainment! Forget all the IPTV applications you know! Download your favorite movies and series, Experience what's happening now! Discover Live TV, Movies, Series, Matches, Football, 4K Broadcast Quality, Multi-Screen Watching Opportunity, Parental Control (Pin Code), Forget Freezing Problems, EPG (Electronic Program Guide), EPG link adding support, M3U Membership Link Adding, Login with Xtream API and many more innovations. The application supports many country languages. You buy the application once and use it for life, there is no monthly or annual payment, it does not contain ads. IPTV Smart Player is a quality and ideal solution for your IPTV needs. It is an advanced IPTV player application with high quality and modern design that allows you to watch high-definition broadcasts easily and in full screen without any lag or freezing problems on your Mac. IPTV Smart Player is the ideal, fully professional new generation live broadcast solution with IPTV, LIVE TV, EPG, VOD, Video, Series, Catch-up, Multi-screen and many more features. Features: - Multi-Language Support - Download Your Favorite Movies and Series - Record Your Live Broadcasts as Video - Add Link Support for EPG (TV Guide) - Built-in EPG (TV program guide) support - Xstream API Support - M3u files and URLs (playlists) - Watch Broadcasts Without Freezing or Stuttering - New Generation Advanced 4K Player - Catch-Up (Catch-up feature allows you to watch programs you missed in a certain time period.) - Channel Favorite Support - Multiple screen options - Unlimited user addition - Multi-language support - Channel Search - New modern layout/UI design - Smooth and fast 4K Streaming (Depending on IPTV service provider) - Parental Control (PIN) - Playing local audio/video files - Adding External Players - Built-in speed test function - Dynamic language switching (multilingual) - and much more * No IPTV application offers media content, this is not specific to our application. Users must add their own membership or provide their own content for streaming. * The screenshots shown on this page are for illustrative purposes only and do not refer to an actual video or its content. * IPTV Smart Player is not affiliated with any third-party providers. Legal Disclaimer: https://www.discoverapp.store/disclaimer Privacy Policy: https://www.discoverapp.store/ssv-privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.discoverapp.store/terms-and-conditions Contact: https://www.discoverapp.store/contact

entry.title: MayLikeWallpaper - best hiapk
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.49 ‚Üí $0.39 [$0.29 ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.39

In-App Purchases

  • buy wallpaper onceÔºö$0.99
  • become VipÔºö$1.99

Application Description

MayLikeWallPaper is a new application that brings the best high-definition wallpapers to your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. With added innovative coloring features, you can get the best free wallpaper application! This application is the perfect way to get free high-resolution wallpapers, thanks to its unique design features: 100% HD wallpapers! Its innovative, unprecedented "coloring" feature allows you to categorize exquisite wallpapers according to your favorite colors. You can find the best and most popular iPhone wallpapers in the world. Weekly updates of the coolest wallpapers Press the "Lucky" button to try your luck and draw a wallpaper from the entire massive image collection. Compatible with both iPhone and iPad. On your iPad, you can rotate your device so you can preview images in both portrait and landscape formats. All wallpapers are categorized by type: abstract, natural, floral, ocean, sky, animals, beach, texture, etc.! All the best HD wallpapers! Get the most popular wallpapers now! Use the latest coloring feature to paint your selected wallpaper with your favorite colors!

entry.title: The Exit 8
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.79 [$2.79 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.79

Application Description

You are trapped in an endless underground passageway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "The Exit 8". Don't overlook any anomalies. If you find anomalies, turn back immediately. If you don't find anomalies, do not turn back. To go out from Exit 8. The Exit 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces and back rooms.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö$0.99
  • Hello World!Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!
